products.name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
products.description: The most powerful MacBook Pro ever with M2 Pro chip, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and exceptional battery life.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.description: Apple's flagship smartphone featuring the A17 Pro chip, ProMotion display with Always-On technology, and a professional camera system.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
products.description: Experience the ultimate in smartphone innovation with the Galaxy S24 Ultra, featuring an advanced camera system, S Pen integration, and AI-powered features.

products.name: iPad Air
products.description: Featuring the M1 chip, new all-screen design with Liquid Retina display, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

products.name: Dell XPS 15
products.description: The XPS 15 combines power and beauty, with a stunning 4K display, powerful Intel processors, and premium build quality.

products.name: AirPods Pro
products.description: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and Adaptive EQ provide an unparalleled wireless headphone experience.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 9
products.description: The ultimate device for a healthy life with new health insights, Always-On Retina display, and ECG app.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation and exceptional sound quality in a comfortable, over-ear design.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
products.description: A premium Android tablet with S Pen support, gorgeous AMOLED display, and powerful performance for productivity and entertainment.

products.name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
products.description: Experience the best of Google with the Pixel 8 Pro, featuring a top-tier camera system, pure Android experience, and innovative AI features.

products.name: LG Gram 17
products.description: Exceptionally light 17-inch laptop with long battery life, Intel Core processors, and stunning display in a lightweight design.

products.name: Amazon Echo Show 10
products.description: Smart display with Alexa that moves with you, featuring premium sound, a 10.1-inch HD screen, and a 13MP camera for video calls.
